knimeNode.name: DF
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node computes the number of documents that contain the terms of the input bag of words table.

fullDescription.intro: This nodes requires a bag of words table as input and computes the number of documents that contain each term. The computed frequency (df) will be added as additional column to the output table.

tab.name: Document selection
tab.option: Specifies the document column to use for frequency counting.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains terms and documents.
ports.outPort: The output table with terms, documents and a corresponding document frequency (DF) value.
